Collections.title: Revision Subjects
Collections.description: Combine your tagged materials to automatically generate flashcards and quizzes.

dialog.title: New subject
dialog.description: Select the tags corresponding to the materials you want to group. We'll notify you if the context window is likely to be exceeded.
dialog.noTags: No tags yet. Add some materials from the library first.
dialog.contextOverLimit: The context window exceeds the limit (~{limit} characters). You can still launch generation, but some information might be truncated.

empty.title: No subjects yet
empty.description: Create your first subject to automatically transform your materials into flashcards and quizzes.

Collections.footer: Click on a subject to open the detailed study view with flashcards and quizzes.

Data.title: Data
Data.description: Export, import and manage your data

Data.importDesc: Import your notes from a JSON file

CollectionView.confirmDeleteDocument: Are you sure you want to delete this document?
CollectionView.noDocumentsDesc: Add your first PDF document to this subject. Once added, you can:
CollectionView.noFlashcardsDesc: To create flashcards, use the chat at the bottom of the page. Example prompts:
CollectionView.promptFlashcards1: Create 10 flashcards on key concepts using ONLY content from documents
CollectionView.promptFlashcards2: Generate flashcards on @document-name based on its actual content
CollectionView.promptFlashcards3: Make revision cards on chapter 3 using text from the PDF
CollectionView.noQuizDesc: To create a quiz, use the chat at the bottom of the page. Example prompts:
CollectionView.promptQuiz1: Create a quiz with 10 multiple choice questions using ONLY content from documents
CollectionView.promptQuiz2: Generate a quiz on @document-name based on its actual content
CollectionView.promptQuiz3: Make a quiz with true/false questions based on text from the PDF
CollectionView.question: question
CollectionView.noSummariesDesc: To create a summary, use the chat at the bottom of the page.
CollectionView.promptSummary1: Summarize key points of this subject
CollectionView.noDocsInCollectionDesc: Add PDF documents to be able to ask questions, create flashcards or generate quizzes.
CollectionView.aiDisclaimer: AI can make mistakes. Check important information.
CollectionView.successFlashcardsQuiz:
‚úÖ {flashcardCount} flashcards and {quizCount} quiz questions successfully created on topic "{topic}"!

Do you want to view them now?
CollectionView.successFlashcards:
‚úÖ {flashcardCount} flashcards successfully created on topic "{topic}"!

Do you want to view them now?
CollectionView.successQuiz:
‚úÖ {quizCount} quiz questions successfully created on topic "{topic}"!

Do you want to view them now?
CollectionView.promptFlashcardsAction: Create flashcards on key concepts using ONLY content from documents in this subject. Base yourself on the actual text of the PDFs, do not invent anything.
CollectionView.promptQuizAction: Create a quiz with multiple choice questions using ONLY content from documents in this subject. Base yourself on the actual text of the PDFs, do not invent anything.
CollectionView.promptSummaryAction: Summarize key points using ONLY content from documents in this subject
CollectionView.generatingContentDesc: AI is analyzing your documents to create relevant content. This may take a few moments.
CollectionView.editCollectionDesc: Edit the title and color of your subject.
CollectionView.title: Title
CollectionView.deleteDocumentDesc: Are you sure you want to delete this document? This action cannot be undone.
CollectionView.deleteFlashcardsDesc: Are you sure you want to delete this flashcard collection? Your progress will be lost.
CollectionView.deleteQuizDesc: Are you sure you want to delete this quiz? Your scores will be lost.
CollectionView.deleteSummaryDesc: Are you sure you want to delete this summary?

Library.title: Subjects
Library.noCollectionsDesc: Create your first subject to organize your documents.
Library.onboardingSubtitle: Upload your course materials (PDF, notes) and let our AI instantly generate quizzes and flashcards for you.

ContextBoard.summaryIntro: Here is an automatically generated summary of your document.
ContextBoard.keyPoint1: Important concept number 1 extracted from the document.
ContextBoard.analysisText: The document covers the following themes with academic depth...
ContextBoard.quizReadyDesc: AI has generated 5 questions based on "{title}".

Calendar.title: Calendar
Calendar.dialogGenerateDesc: AI will analyze your documents and create a custom revision schedule.
Calendar.clickHint: Tip: Click a day to see summary, click again to see detailed schedule.

Tutorial.welcomeDesc: Your new intelligent workspace. Nothly helps you organize your courses, understand your documents, and revise faster than ever.
Tutorial.step1Desc: It all starts here. Click on the 'Subjects' tab (the second icon) to create your first binder (e.g., Law, History, Marketing).
Tutorial.step2Desc: Once inside a subject, drop your PDFs. The AI analyzes them so you can chat with them.
Tutorial.step3Desc: Use the quick action bar to generate content instantly: Flashcards, Quizzes, Summaries, or Chat.

Subjects.title: My Subjects
Subjects.noSubjectsDesc: Create your first subject and unlock AI-powered learning. Upload PDFs, generate flashcards, and ace your exams! üöÄ

Favorites.title: FAVORITES
Favorites.hallOfFameDesc: Pin your most important subjects and documents here for lightning-fast access.
Favorites.starSubjectsDesc: Keep your current focus top of mind.
Favorites.keyDocumentsDesc: Never lose track of that one cheat sheet.

Quiz.title: Quiz Hub
